SimpleBattery.cc

00001 /* -*- mode:c++ -*- ********************************************************
00002  * Energy Framework for Omnet++, version 0.9
00003  *
00004  * Author:  Laura Marie Feeney
00005  *
00006  * Copyright 2009 Swedish Institute of Computer Science.
00007  *
00008  * This software is provided `as is' and without any express or implied
00009  * warranties, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of
00010  * merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
00011  *
00012  ***************************************************************************/
00013 /*
00014  * A simple linear model of battery consumption.  Simple Battery
00015  * receives DrawMsg's from one or more devices, updates residual
00016  * capacity (total current * voltage * time), publishes HostState
00017  * notification on battery depletion, and provides time series and
00018  * summary information to Battery Stats module.
00019  */
00020 #include "SimpleBattery.h"
00021 
00022 #include <limits>
00023 
00024 #include "FWMath.h"
00025 #include "BatteryStats.h"
00026 #include "FindModule.h"
00027 
00032 static inline bool lessOrEqualNull(register double x) {
00033   return x <= 0.0 || x <= 1.0e-12;
00034 }
00035 
00036 Define_Module(SimpleBattery);
00037 
00038 SimpleBattery::SimpleBattery()
00039   : BaseBattery()
00040   , numDevices(0)
00041   , capmAh(0)
00042   , nominalCapmAh(0)
00043   , voltage(0)
00044   , resolution()
00045   , timeout(NULL)
00046   , publish(NULL)
00047   , publishDelta(0)
00048   , publishTime()
00049   , batteryState(NULL)
00050   , hostState()
00051   , capacity(0)
00052   , nominalCapacity(0)
00053   , residualCapacity(0)
00054   , lastPublishCapacity(0)
00055   , lifetime()
00056   , residualVec()
00057   , devices(NULL)
00058   , registeredDevices(0)
00059   , lastUpdateTime()
00060   , host(NULL)
00061 {}
00062 
00063 void SimpleBattery::initialize(int stage) {
00064   BaseBattery::initialize(stage);
00065 
00066   if (stage == 0) {
00067     voltage = par("voltage");
00068     nominalCapmAh = par("nominal");
00069     if (nominalCapmAh <= 0) {
00070       error("invalid nominal capacity value");
00071     }
00072     capmAh = par("capacity");
00073 
00074     // Publish capacity to BatteryStats every publishTime (if > 0) and
00075     // whenever capacity has changed by publishDelta (if < 100%).
00076     publishTime = 0;
00077     publishTime = par("publishTime");
00078     if (publishTime > 0) {
00079       publish = new cMessage("publish", PUBLISH);
00080       publish->setSchedulingPriority(2000);
00081       scheduleAt(simTime() + publishTime, publish);
00082     }
00083     publishDelta = 1;
00084     publishDelta = par("publishDelta");
00085     if (publishDelta < 0 || publishDelta > 1) {
00086       error("invalid publishDelta value");
00087     }
00088 
00089     resolution = par("resolution");
00090 
00091     debugEV<< "capacity = " << capmAh << "mA-h (nominal = " << nominalCapmAh <<
00092     ") at " << voltage << "V" << std::endl;
00093     debugEV << "publishDelta = " << publishDelta * 100 << "%, publishTime = "
00094     << publishTime << "s, resolution = " << resolution << "sec"
00095     << std::endl;
00096 
00097     capacity = capmAh * 60 * 60 * voltage; // use mW-sec internally
00098     nominalCapacity = nominalCapmAh * 60 * 60 * voltage;
00099     batteryState = new BatteryState(nominalCapacity);
00100 
00101     residualCapacity = lastPublishCapacity = capacity;
00102 
00103     lifetime = -1; // -1 means not dead
00104 
00105     // DISable by default (use BatteryStats for data collection)
00106     residualVec.disable();
00107 
00108     residualVec.setName("residualCapacity");
00109     residualVec.record(residualCapacity);
00110 
00111     timeout = new cMessage("auto-update", AUTO_UPDATE);
00112     timeout->setSchedulingPriority(500);
00113     scheduleAt(simTime() + resolution, timeout);
00114 
00115     // publish battery depletion on hostStateCat
00116     // periodically publish residual capacity on batteryCat
00117     numDevices = hasPar("numDevices") ? par("numDevices") : 0;
00118     if (numDevices == 0) {
00119       EV << "Warning: no devices attached to battery\n";
00120     }
00121     registeredDevices = 0;
00122 
00123     devices = new DeviceEntry[numDevices];
00124     lastUpdateTime = simTime();
00125 
00126     host = findHost();
00127   }
00128   else if (stage == 1) {
00129     hostState.set(HostState::ACTIVE);
00130     emit(catHostStateSignal, &hostState);
00131 
00132     if (publishDelta < 1 || publishTime> 0 ) {
00133       batteryState->set(residualCapacity);
00134       emit(BatteryStats::catBatteryStateSignal, batteryState);
00135     }
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 int SimpleBattery::registerDevice(const std::string& name, int numAccts)
00140 {
00141   int deviceID = registeredDevices++;
00142 
00143   if(registeredDevices > numDevices) {
00144     error("To much devices registered with battery. Please adjust the Batteries numDevices parameter!");
00145   }
00146 
00147   if (!devices[deviceID].name.empty()) {
00148     error("device already registered!");
00149   }
00150 
00151   devices[deviceID].name = name;
00152 
00153   if (numAccts < 1) {
00154     error("number of activities must be at least 1");
00155   }
00156   devices[deviceID].numAccts = numAccts;
00157 
00158   double *accts = new double[numAccts];
00159   for (int i = 0; i < numAccts; ++i) {
00160     accts[i] = 0.0;
00161   }
00162   devices[deviceID].accts = accts;
00163 
00164   simtime_t *times = new simtime_t[numAccts];
00165   for (int i = 0; i < numAccts; ++i) {
00166     times[i] = 0.0;
00167   }
00168   devices[deviceID].times = times;
00169 
00170   debugEV<< "initialized device " << devices[deviceID].name << " as device "
00171   << deviceID << " with " << devices[deviceID].numAccts <<
00172   " accounts" << std::endl;
00173 
00174   return deviceID;
00175 }
00176 
00177 void SimpleBattery::draw(int deviceID, DrawAmount& amount, int activity)
00178 {
00179   if(deviceID < 0 || deviceID > registeredDevices) {
00180     error("Unknown device ID!");
00181   }
00182 
00183   if (amount.getType() == DrawAmount::CURRENT) {
00184 
00185     if (devices[deviceID].name.empty()) {
00186       error("drawMsg from unregistered device");
00187     }
00188 
00189     double current = amount.getValue();
00190     if (activity < 0 && current != 0)
00191       error("invalid CURRENT message");
00192 
00193     debugEV << simTime() << " device " << deviceID <<
00194     " (" << devices[deviceID].name << ") draw current " << current <<
00195     "mA, activity = " << activity << std::endl;
00196 
00197     // update the residual capacity (finish previous current draw)
00198     deductAndCheck();
00199 
00200     // set the new current draw in the device vector
00201     devices[deviceID].draw            = current;
00202     devices[deviceID].currentActivity = activity;
00203   }
00204 
00205   else if (amount.getType() == DrawAmount::ENERGY) {
00206 
00207     if (devices[deviceID].name.empty()) {
00208       error("drawMsg from unregistered device");
00209     }
00210     double energy = amount.getValue();
00211     if (!(activity >=0 && activity < devices[deviceID].numAccts)) {
00212       error("invalid activity specified");
00213     }
00214 
00215     debugEV << simTime() << " device " << deviceID <<
00216     " (" << devices[deviceID].name << ") deduct " << energy <<
00217     " mW-s, activity = " << activity << std::endl;
00218 
00219     // deduct a fixed energy cost
00220 
00221     devices[deviceID].accts[activity] += energy;
00222     residualCapacity                  -= energy;
00223 
00224     if (residualCapacity > nominalCapacity)
00225       residualCapacity = nominalCapacity;
00226     else if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity))
00227       residualCapacity = 0;
00228 
00229     // update the residual capacity (ongoing current draw), mostly
00230     // to check whether to publish (or perish)
00231     deductAndCheck();
00232   }
00233   else {
00234     error("Unknown power type!");
00235   }
00236 }
00237 
00238 void SimpleBattery::handleMessage(cMessage *msg) {
00239   if (msg->isSelfMessage()) {
00240 
00241     switch (msg->getKind()) {
00242     case AUTO_UPDATE:
00243       // update the residual capacity (ongoing current draw)
00244       scheduleAt(simTime() + resolution, timeout);
00245       deductAndCheck();
00246       break;
00247 
00248     case PUBLISH:
00249       // publish the state to the BatteryStats module
00250       emit(BatteryStats::catBatteryStateSignal, batteryState);
00251       lastPublishCapacity = residualCapacity;
00252 
00253       scheduleAt(simTime() + publishTime, publish);
00254       break;
00255 
00256     default:
00257       error("battery receives mysterious timeout");
00258       break;
00259     }
00260   } else {
00261     error("unexpected message");
00262     delete msg;
00263   }
00264 }
00265 
00266 void SimpleBattery::handleHostState(const HostState& /*state*/)
00267 {
00268   //does nothing yet
00269 }
00270 
00271 void SimpleBattery::deductAndCheck() {
00272   Enter_Method_Silent();
00273   // already depleted, devices should have stopped sending drawMsg,
00274   // but we catch any leftover messages in queue
00275   if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity)) {
00276     return;
00277   }
00278 
00279   const double    dLastResCap= residualCapacity;
00280   const simtime_t now        = simTime();
00281   const simtime_t tDeltaT    = now - lastUpdateTime;
00282   const double    dVoltDelta = voltage * SIMTIME_DBL(tDeltaT);
00283 
00284   // If device[i] has never drawn current (e.g. because the device
00285   // hasn't been used yet or only uses ENERGY) the currentActivity is
00286   // still -1.  If the device is not drawing current at the moment,
00287   // draw has been reset to 0, so energy is also 0.  (It might perhaps
00288   // be wise to guard more carefully against fp issues later.)
00289 
00290   for (int i = 0; i < numDevices; i++) {
00291     int currentActivity = devices[i].currentActivity;
00292     if (currentActivity > -1) {
00293       const double energy = devices[i].draw * dVoltDelta;
00294       if (energy != 0) {
00295         if (residualCapacity >= energy || residualCapacity != 0.0) {
00296           devices[i].accts[currentActivity] += energy;
00297         }
00298         devices[i].times[currentActivity] += tDeltaT;
00299         residualCapacity                  -= energy;
00300       }
00301     }
00302   }
00303 
00304   lastUpdateTime = now;
00305 
00306   if (residualCapacity > nominalCapacity)
00307     residualCapacity = nominalCapacity;
00308   else if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity))
00309     residualCapacity = 0;
00310 
00311   if (dLastResCap != residualCapacity) {
00312     debugEV<< simTime() << " residual capacity = " << residualCapacity << " fill state is " << estimateResidualRelative()*100.0 << "%" << endl;
00313   }
00314   // update display
00315   if (host && ev.isGUI()) {
00316     const double dCapacityRatio = estimateResidualRelative();
00317     if((dCapacityRatio < 0.8) && (dCapacityRatio > 0.6)) {
00318       host->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2",0,"status/battery_80");
00319     }
00320     else if((dCapacityRatio < 0.6) && (dCapacityRatio > 0.4)) {
00321       host->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2",0,"status/battery_60");
00322     }
00323     else if((dCapacityRatio < 0.4) && (dCapacityRatio > 0.2)) {
00324       host->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2",0,"status/battery_40");
00325     }
00326     else if((dCapacityRatio < 0.2) && (dCapacityRatio > 0.0)) {
00327       host->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2",0,"status/battery_20");
00328     }
00329     else if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity) ) {
00330       host->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2",0,"status/battery_0");
00331     }
00332   }
00333 
00334   // battery is depleted
00335   if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity)) {
00336 
00337     EV << "battery depleted at t = " << now << "s" << std::endl;
00338 
00339     lifetime = now;
00340 
00341     // announce hostState
00342     hostState.set(HostState::FAILED);
00343     emit(catHostStateSignal, &hostState);
00344 
00345     // final battery level announcement
00346     if (publishDelta < 1 || publishTime> 0) {
00347       batteryState->set(0);
00348       emit(BatteryStats::catBatteryStateSignal, batteryState);
00349       // cancelEvent(publish);
00350     }
00351 
00352     // no more resolution-based timeouts
00353     cancelEvent(timeout);
00354   }
00355   // battery is not depleted, continue
00356   else {
00357     batteryState->set(residualCapacity);
00358 
00359     // publish the battery capacity if it changed by more than delta
00360     if ((lastPublishCapacity - residualCapacity)/capacity >= publishDelta) {
00361       emit(BatteryStats::catBatteryStateSignal, batteryState);
00362       lastPublishCapacity = residualCapacity;
00363     }
00364   }
00365   residualVec.record(residualCapacity);
00366 }
00367 
00368   // the three functions below should be supported in all battery
00369   // modules.  in SimpleBattery, they're trivial.  a more accurate model
00370   // would require substantially more complex functionality here
00371 
00372   // Return open circuit battery voltage.  in SimpleBattery, the open
00373   // circuit voltage is fixed
00374 
00375 double SimpleBattery::getVoltage() const {
00376   Enter_Method_Silent();
00377   return voltage;
00378 }
00379 
00380 // Return host's own state-of-charge estimate of residual capacity
00381 // (absolute value in mW-s).  In SimpleBattery, the state-of-charge
00382 // estimate is the same as the residual capacity.
00383 
00384 // Use getAbs() rather than residualCapacity, which can become negative
00385 
00386 double SimpleBattery::estimateResidualAbs() const {
00387   Enter_Method_Silent();
00388 
00389   if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity))
00390     return 0.0;
00391   return residualCapacity;
00392 }
00393 
00394 // Return host's own estimate of residual capacity (relative to
00395 // nominal capacity).
00396 
00397 double SimpleBattery::estimateResidualRelative() const {
00398   Enter_Method_Silent();
00399 
00400   if (lessOrEqualNull(residualCapacity))
00401     return 0.0;
00402   return residualCapacity / nominalCapacity;
00403 }
00404 
00405 void SimpleBattery::finish() {
00406   // do a final update of battery capacity
00407   deductAndCheck();
00408 
00409   for (int i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
00410 
00411     double    Total   = 0;
00412     simtime_t TotTime = 0;
00413 
00414     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts; ++j) {
00415       Total   += devices[i].accts[j];
00416       TotTime += devices[i].times[j];
00417     }
00418     debugEV << "device " << i << " (" << devices[i].name << ") consumed "
00419             << Total << " mW-s at " << TotTime <<"s" << std::endl;
00420 
00421     for (int j = 0; j < devices[i].numAccts && devices[i].numAccts > 1; ++j) {
00422       debugEV << "device " << i << ", activity " << j << ": " << devices[i].accts[j] << " mWs and "
00423               << devices[i].times[j] << "s" << std::endl;
00424     }
00425 
00426     // check that total time in all states matches simulation time
00427     if (FWMath::round(SIMTIME_DBL(TotTime) * 1000000) - FWMath::round(SIMTIME_DBL(simTime()) * 1000000) != 0)
00428     {
00429       EV << "WARNING: device " << devices[i].name << " total time " << TotTime
00430          << "s != sim time " << simTime() << "s (may not matter)" << std::endl;
00431     }
00432   }
00433 
00434   if (host) {
00435     BatteryStats *statsModule = FindModule<BatteryStats*>::findSubModule(host);
00436     if (statsModule) {
00437       statsModule->summary(capacity, residualCapacity, lifetime);
00438       statsModule->detail(devices, numDevices);
00439     }
00440     else {
00441       opp_warning("No BatteryStats module found, no statistic summary/details available.");
00442     }
00443   }
00444   cComponent::finish();
00445 }
00446 
00447 SimpleBattery::~SimpleBattery() {
00448   cancelAndDelete(timeout);
00449   if (publishTime> 0)
00450     cancelAndDelete(publish);
00451 
00452   delete [] devices; // it's ok, batteryStats is done with device info
00453 
00454   delete batteryState;
00455 }
